comment: Well, the fact that it works offline, updates fast and has configuration options makes it great. If you didn't know, you can swipe left or right to see the previous or next entry. I don't buy apps often but having multiple countries for just a few euros per year  is worth it for sure.
title: Best best best

author: Tomáš Koubský
comment: Perfect app for years. Nevertheless, last days it downloads wrong (or obsolete?) timetables in Prague. E.g. tram n. 9, more times. Please fix this, it has no sense when it shows wrong wrong timetables for some lines.

author: Jezisheck Tab
comment: The timetables needs to be purchased, but you get 30 day free trial of all available timetables and for me, €3 is okay price to have all public transport in Czech Republic on the go in offline. The design seems neat and professionally done. I also appreciate there are no ads or rate-the-app pop-ups.
title: Perfect offline IDOS

author: Marián Ligocký
comment: It's difficult to set right time of arrive or departure. Anyway, the application is great
title: Bad time picker

author: Viktor Plaček
comment: Using it everyday. Still wondering how intuitive is its usage. It is must have if you use any form of public traffic regularly.
title: Cannot live without it

comment: The only benefit is offline usage. Updates are very late, incomplete info about changing trams, you have to know the place well in order not to waste your time.
title: Horrible updates, incomplete info

author: Peto G
comment: mi to v Bratislave ukazuje nejake blbosti. 5ku elektricku ukazuje ako bus, a niektore epektricky uplne vynechava. 4ku pred par dnami ignorovalo uplne, teraz ju ukazuje tiez ako bus. Niekolko rokov som appku vychvaloval do nebies, prosim fixnite to, nech sa na to da stale spolahnut. Dakujem
title: Posledny tyzden

author: Ondřej Votava
comment: Works absolutely perfect. Always shows nearest stops, remembers frequent ones and works offline.
title: Great transportation application

author: Nick S
comment: It's a must app if you're travelling to Prague, Cesky Krumlov or any other city in Czech Republic. I really loved the route planning feature of this app. Very handy. I would highly recommend it!

author: soberský
comment: Just wonderful app. It has everything you'll need to navigate through Prague city jungle.
title: Everything I need

author: peter hosking
comment: The app works well. Just hard to know when trams arrive at different times whether it's the fault of the app or the tram.

author: Petr Janeček
comment: Občas až neuvěřitelně propracovaná aplikace, která nabízí prostě všechny dopravní informace, o kterých jsem ani netušil, že bych je mohl potřebovat, v jednom přehledném a dobře ovladatelném balíčku. Stojí za každou korunu!
title: Jednoznačně nejlepší dopravní aplikace na trhu

author: Konstantin Hapak
comment: The app stuck with no internet connection straight after download from internet...

author: Michal Opalek
comment: Nemam vyhrady, pouzivam stale a hlave bez ziadnych problemov ...

author: Lukáš Šimíček
comment: Přidejte ještě možnost objednat jízdenku pomocí aplikace a bude to dokonalé Chybí mi tu možnost jako u idos poloha vlaku nebo autobusu.

author: David Král
comment: This is the first app I have ever paid for.  The offline timetables are  reliable and regularly updated. The design is neat. Worth 3eur when free trial expires.
Of the various offline journey planners I've tried over the years this is by far and away the best. Well worth the price.
title: Excellent

author: Jakub Petrovský
comment: Skvela grafika, skvele spracovanie, rychle, intuitivne, Material Design, nelutujem kupu ;)
title: Lenovo P70

author: Fox Saiffer
comment: Very fast. Works without internet. Autocomplete during writing stations. Best app for public transport (better than imhd).

author: Michal Cádrik
comment: Very good application, it is worth to buy it. You can plan your trips with variety of transport companies.
title: Super application!

author: A Google User
comment: Jednoznačne najlepšia aplikácia svojho druhu, neviem si bez nej predstaviť jediný deň. Škoda, že väčšina ľudí o nej nevie a využíva "konkurenčné" aplikácie, ktoré sú často závislé na internete a vyhľadávanie v nich je zdĺhavá katastrofa. Minule pozerám v apke odchody stojac na zastávke a kamaráti sa ma pýtali, prečo sa radšej nepozriem na rozpis odchodov, ktorý je tam vyvesený, že je to rýchlejšie. Mýlili sa.. ;)

author: Filip Oborník
comment: Best app if you want to find bus immediately. I can only recommend it !
title: Best helper in city

author: A Google User
comment: Vyborna aplikacia, ale vyhladavanie spojov nie je optimalne. Pre Bratislavu mi stranka imhd.sk castokrat najde lepsie spojenia, ak treba prestupovat.

author: saul knipses
comment: Offline, but automatically updated when you're on wifi. IDOS, but in English and not requiring data.
title: Very useful

author: Petr Čech
comment: Naprosto dokonalé. Najde cestu odkudkoliv kamkoliv offline a není to ani tak drahé.
To jsem potřeboval. Výborná aplikace. Nenašel jsem lepší. Velkou výhodou je vyhledávání offline.

author: Michal Kvasnicka
comment: Asi nejlepší aplikace pro hromadnou dopravu

author: Tomáš Arcanis Jílek
comment: This is how IDOS should have been made

author: Slavomír Žiak
comment: super kombinacia vyhladavania cesty vlaku a mhd
title: super

author: Richard Golier
comment: constantly downloads data in the background. 10kBps

author: Dominik Šípek
comment: Nejlepší aplikace na vyhledávání spojů.
Great app, offline trains and buses, cheap and fast. I recommend it to everybody.

author: Jan Milík
comment: Great app. Smarter then most other apps and combines multiplex timetables.
I use app more than 4 years. I don't regrets.
title: Great

author: Jan Prazak
comment: Jsem spokojen.
title: Super!

author: A Google User
comment: Aktualne v roce 2017 vidim velky posun k lepsimu po novem instalovani, co mi jeste schazi je moznost OMEZIT CELKOVOU DOBU DOPRAVY protoze to napr.k 20min spojeni vyhleda 4h spojeni pres vzdalena mesta, coz je hloupost. Dale moznost KATEGORIZACE/TAGOVANI OBLIBENYCH abych mohl rozdelit mistni spojeni od dalkovych nebo pri pobytu v uplne jinem kraji atp.

author: Martin Vrabel
comment: Awesomme, absolute awesomme
title: Awesomme

author: Petr Novotny
comment: Absolutely best, ideal, top app. Super great work!

author: Erik Bročko
comment: Perfect app for city, intercity and international transit.

author: Adam Horváth
comment: Everything I need from an app like this.
title: Great
